ygData.subject: RE: Off topic question
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe it is one of 2 special rubies that you need for the jewelled skull quest ... From: Trizzen Do Trevan [mailto:trizzen@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
I believe it is one of 2 special rubies that you need for the jewelled skull
quest

-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 11:56 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Off topic question


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>

This is a bit off topic, but I can't seem to find the
answer.

I recently killed the named gnoll in splitpaw that you
get to by swimming through the underwater tunnel. I
know lots of higher levels kill him, but for what? The
only unusual thing I got was a ruby pendant with a
meager +1int and no ac. What am i missing? Oh yeah, my
dark elven brother Nixx, proceeded to kill me very
quickly after I looted the gnoll. ;)

Thanks!

Darkmoon 16th circle necromancer.
This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
